description: This file defines the PlayerRepository interface, which extends JpaRepository for managing Player entities. It includes custom query methods for finding players by room ID and ordering, as well as finding a player by room ID and color.

classes.name: PlayerRepository
classes.description: Repository interface for Player entities, providing data access methods.

methods.name: findByRoom_IdOrderByTurnOrderAsc
methods.description: Retrieves a list of players in a specific room ordered by their turn order.

methods.name: findByRoom_IdAndColor
methods.description: Finds a player in a specific room with a given color, returning an Optional Player.
